TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextBoxControlBuilder extends System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder

Docs.summary: Interacts with the parser to build a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxControlBuilder> class is an internal helper class used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.

block.para: To create a custom control builder for a -derived control, you need to inherit from this class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxControlBuilder> class is an internal helper class used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool AllowWhitespaceLiterals() cil managed

Docs.summary: Specifies whether white-space literals are allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to ignore white space in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool HtmlDecodeLiterals() cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether the literal string of the control must be HTML decoded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxControlBuilder.HtmlDecodeLiterals%2A> method to determine whether the literal string of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control must be HTML decoded. This implementation of the method always returns `true` to indicate that the literal string of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control must be HTML decoded.
